name: Wallpost
overview:
Wallpost founded on December 14th, 2009 is a blend of social networking and photo sharing landscape. It has its headquarters in Hyderabad, India

Wallpost offers its users the opportunity to stay connected with their friends, send them instant messages, share the pictures and display photo statistics. The members of the Wallpost must be of age thirteen and above. Wallpost was initially launched as a photo sharing website, which later evolved into a full-fledged social networking site.

Since its launch, Wallpost has been incessantly adding new features to it. Wallpost provides Social Ads for its members to promote their products and enterprises. Promising writers have a scope to unleash their potential through the articles. Wallpost enables you to import the contacts from GMAIL, AOL, YAHOO Mail, and Hotmail.

Statistics for Photos, Albums, Account and Social Ads are the USPs of Wallpost. This ensures security to its members and helps analyze the profile traffic. At present, Wallpost consists of a team of 7 members, who are actively involved in the progress of Wallpost.
